summary: Reqtified patch for the Tera Elin Race 2 from LL.
descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#6fa8dc]The Tera Elin 2 Race has a lot of customisation and the support for all its various sliders is maddening. But it has no Requiem patch, so I've changed that. 

The Elin 2 race is similar to an Orc in stats, but this is fitting from a lore standpoint when we're talking about Tera. The Elin are swift warriors that can wield anything from knives up to Scythes. For this reason, i've lowered the health, but increased the Stamina. They are classed as a beastrace, but since they're mainly human, i've opted not to include strong stomach. 

This is a patch only, with no assets included. You need do some Google-fu and find the race yourself. It requires TeraElinRace.esm, Racecompatibility.esm and Requiem.esp as Masters. 

I don't support the adult content sometimes associated with this mod, i'm just patching it. For this reason, I class this patch as finished and I won't be troubleshooting any issues you have with the Race mod itself. [/color][/font][/i]
author: G0R3Z

files.name: Requiem - Terarace2
files.changelogHtml:
Added all relevant keywords to ensure compatibility
Rebalanced Race stats
